lead_paragraph: Spanish Olympic team chief Cayetano Cornet is hopeful that "critical" conditions at the Olympic village in Rio will drastically improve in time for the arrival of the bulk of his country's delegation on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Spain Optimistic About 'Critical' Problems at Olympic Village
headline.main: Spain Optimistic About 'Critical' Problems at Olympic Village

snippet: Spanish Olympic team chief Cayetano Cornet is hopeful that "critical" conditions at the Olympic village in Rio will drastically improve in time for the arrival of the bulk of his country's delegation on Friday....
